T02D1647:309b-1: sha pa sam ska ra s'a dh'a nam birhi:/
T02D1647:309b-3: ro bsreg pa'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga / dpal
T02D1647:309b-4: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D1647:309b-5: // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1647:309b-6: gang dag sngon gyi las dang 'phral gyi rkyen dag gis //
T02D1647:309b-7: nad pa'i srog zad shi ba'i dus byas tshe /
T02D1647:309b-8: rnam smin lus la brten nas sdig sgrib sbyang ba'i thabs //
T02D1647:309b-9: dri med lung dang bla ma'i bka' bzhin bri //
T02D1647:309b-10: de la re zhig dang por ro seg cing sbyang bar 'os pa'i gnas skabs dang sbyar nas /
T02D1647:309b-11: dang po bsnyen pa la 'jug par bya ste /
T02D1647:309b-12: de yang bsnyen pa'i gnas gang yin par ro drangs
T02D1647:309b-13: la chu gtsang dri zhim po dang sbyor bas khrus
T02D1647:310a-1: zhim po'i lde gus dril phyi byas nas /
T02D1647:310a-2: yi ge tsi la sogs pa gnas drug tu bri ba'am gdags so //
T02D1647:310a-3: de nas ras sam snam bu gsar pas dkris la /
T02D1647:310a-4: me tog gi phreng bas brgyan nas /
T02D1647:310a-5: mandala ba'i ko ba tsam pa byas la /
T02D1647:310a-6: der me tog sil ma gtor te /
T02D1647:310a-7: ku sha'i chun po'i stan la gzhag go //
T02D1647:310a-8: de'i drung du yang mchod pa'i mandala bya ba dang /
T02D1647:310a-10: mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams pa dang /
T02D1647:310a-13: yol ba la sogs pa'i rgyan dang bcas par bya'o //
T02D1647:310a-14: de nas bdag nyid khrus byas la /
T02D1647:310a-16: cho ga'i rim pa'am mos pa tsam gyis dpal he ru ka'i skur bsgoms la /
T02D1647:310a-17: gnas drug tu yi ge dgod pa dang /
T02D1647:310a-18: cod pan gyi lhas rgyas gdab pa dang /
T02D1647:310a-19: snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge hr'i:
T02D1647:310a-20: la sngags kyi phreng bas bskor bar bsgom par bya'o
T02D1647:310a-21: // de nas mchod pa thams cad yi ge 'bru gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1647:310a-22: de'i 'og tu bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis /
T02D1647:310a-23: lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas nas /
T02D1647:310a-24: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
T02D1647:310a-25: bdag nyid dpal he ru ka mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor
T02D1647:310a-26: dang bcas pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor nam mkha'
T02D1647:310a-29: de la mchod pa rnams kyis rim bzhin du mchod nas /
T02D1647:310a-30: de'i rjes la yan lag bdun pa'i mchod pa'am /
T02D1647:310a-32: de nas bstod pa bya ste /
T02D1647:310a-33: mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs che ba //
T02D1647:310a-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bstod pas bstod la /
T02D1647:310a-35: mkha' 'gro ma la gtor ma bsngos te /
T02D1647:310a-37: yi ge brgya pas bzod gsol byas la gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1647:310a-38: de nas sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na'i sngags brjod pa'i sgo nas stong pa nyid bsgoms nas /
T02D1647:310a-39: de'i dang las h'um gi snang ba'i 'od zer las /
T02D1647:310b-0: dra ba @310b las sa gzhi ste /
T02D1647:310b-1: srung ba'i 'khor lo dur khrod brgyad dang bcas par bsgom mo //
T02D1647:310b-2: de nas bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi lcags kyus /
T02D1647:310b-3: gang shi ba de'i sems rnam par shes pa bar do'i gnas sam /
T02D1647:310b-4: rigs drug gang na gnas pa'i shes pa'i ngo bo
T02D1647:310b-5: aa thung ngu dkar la phra ba gcig tu drangs
T02D1647:310b-6: te / ro'i kha'i lam nas snying gar bcug pas /
T02D1647:310b-7: de nyid rnam par shes pa'i sems dang ldan par sngar gyi ji lta ba bzhin du bsams la /
T02D1647:310b-8: de'i 'og tu bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D1647:310b-9: aom a'a:hr'i:h'um zhes pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi phreng sngags bzlas pas /
T02D1647:310b-10: bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon phreng sngags dang bcas pa las 'od 'phros pas //
T02D1647:310b-11: bdag gi sna'i rlung dang 'dres nas /
T02D1647:310b-12: bsgrub bya'i sna'i lam nas snying gar zhugs pas /
T02D1647:310b-13: bsgrub bya'i snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i sa
T02D1647:310b-14: bon phreng sngags dang bcas par gyur par bsam mo
T02D1647:310b-15: // de nas bzlas pa byas pas bdag gi snying ga'i sngags las 'od 'phros te /
T02D1647:310b-17: snying ga'i sngags la phog pas /
T02D1647:310b-18: bsgrub bya'i snying ga'i sngags las 'od 'phros te /
T02D1647:310b-19: bsgrub bya'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad sbyang bar bsam mo //
T02D1647:310b-20: de ltar zhag du lcogs la sogs par bsnyen pa bya'o //
T02D1647:310b-21: de nas bsnyen pa thon pa dang /
T02D1647:310b-22: bsgrub bya'i sngags kyi phreng ba 'od du zhu nas /
T02D1647:310b-23: lus mgo mjug tu thim pas /
T02D1647:310b-24: sgrib pa thams cad byang nas lus shel dangs pa ltar gyur pa bsam mo //
T02D1647:310b-25: de nas lhag par gnas pa sta gon gyi cho ga gzhung dang mthun par bya /
T02D1647:310b-26: de'i rjes la mdun du ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1647:310b-27: sprul la der dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa nas dbang
T02D1647:310b-28: bskur ba gnas skabs dang sbyar la dbang bskur ro
T02D1647:310b-29: // gal te bsnyen pa ma lcogs par gyur na /
T02D1647:310b-30: de'i tshe khrus bya ba nas dbang bskur ba'i yan lag rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D1647:310b-31: de nas bkra shis pa'i gnas su sa'i cho ga sngon du 'gro bar ro drangs la /
T02D1647:311a-2: sa tshon gyis zlum po dkar por byas te /
T02D1647:311a-4: de nas phyogs gcig tu sreg khang brtsigs te /
T02D1647:311a-5: ji tsam regs pa'i sa bcad de mandala byas la /
T02D1647:311a-6: de'i dbus su khru byed dang do pa tsam la /
T02D1647:311a-7: zabs su de'i phyed brkos la /
T02D1647:311a-8: de'i dbus su sor bcu pa'i lte bar 'phangs su sor bzhi pa byas la /
T02D1647:311a-10: lte ba dkar po 'dab ma rnams dmar por byas la /
T02D1647:311a-11: der mtshan ma mi dgos so //
T02D1647:311a-12: mtha' ma rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ro //
T02D1647:311a-13: de'i steng gi kha khyer sor lnga pa'i chu zheng
T02D1647:311a-14: mnyam par byas la phyi rol gyi gzhi ser por
T02D1647:311a-15: bya'o // de nas mtshams bzhir ka ba bzhi btsugs la /
T02D1647:311a-16: phyogs gnyis su gdung gnyis btang ste /
T02D1647:311a-17: de'i steng du shing khang tshul bzhin du brtsigs la /
T02D1647:311a-19: de nyid kyi drung du las thams cad pa'i thab khung gzhung bzhin du byas nas /
T02D1647:311a-21: sbyin sreg gi rdzas bud shing dang /
T02D1647:311a-24: mar la sogs pa bsreg par 'os pa'i rdzas thams cad gzhung bzhin du bsham mo //
T02D1647:311a-25: de nas bdag nyid khrus byas la /
T02D1647:311a-27: mchod pa lnga la sogs pa thams cad bsags la /
T02D1647:311a-28: bdag nyid dpal he ru ka'i skur bsgoms te /
T02D1647:311a-29: mchod pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1647:311a-30: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis /
T02D1647:311a-31: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas nam mkha' la sprul te bsams la /
T02D1647:311a-32: phyi nang gi mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod nas /
T02D1647:311a-33: yan lag bdun pa'i mchod pa dang /
T02D1647:311a-34: bstod pa yan lag gzhung bzhin du bya'o //
T02D1647:311a-35: de nas stong pa nyid du bsgom pa sngon du
T02D1647:311a-36: 'gro ba'i srung ba'i 'khor lo gzhung bzhin du bsgoms
T02D1647:311a-37: la ; der sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D1647:311a-38: de yang sbyin sreg gi cho ga nas byung ba
T02D1647:311a-39: bzhin du me lha'i mchod pa yan chad rdzogs par
T02D1647:311a-40: byas la / de nas me lha 'od du zhu ste /
T02D1647:311a-41: 'bar ba'i rnam par gyur bar bsams la der ye
T02D1647:311a-42: shes kyi lha la sbyin sreg gi mchod pa bya
T02D1647:311b-0: ste / skabs 'dir bsgrub @311b bya'i lhag pa'i lha
T02D1647:311b-1: gang yin pa der cho ga'i yan lag gis bskyed
T02D1647:311b-2: la ye shes sems dpa' snying ga'i sa bon gyis
T02D1647:311b-4: mchod pa lnga la sogs pas mchod /
T02D1647:311b-5: de nas sreg rdzas rnams kyis rim bzhin du mchod la /
T02D1647:311b-6: 'dod don gsol ba yan chad bya ste /
T02D1647:311b-7: sbyin sreg gi cho ga dang mthun no //
T02D1647:311b-9: gcig gis sdig pa bsreg pa'i ting nge 'dzin bya ste /
T02D1647:311b-11: bsang gtor gyi chus bsangs la /
T02D1647:311b-12: bsgrub bya'i rnam smin gyi lus de nyid /
T02D1647:311b-13: dpag tu med pa'i dus rgyud la bsags pa'i las
T02D1647:311b-14: dang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma'i sdig pa'i ngo bo
T02D1647:311b-15: yi ge kam nag po'i phung po gcig tu bsams
T02D1647:311b-16: la / 'og gi sna tshogs padma'i lte ba las me 'bar bas /
T02D1647:311b-17: kam de rim gyis bsreg par bsgoms te /
T02D1647:311b-18: aom sarba p'a pam sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1647:311b-19: aom sarba karm'a sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1647:311b-20: aom sarba du: kha sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1647:311b-21: zhes brjod cing sdig pa bsreg pa'i ting nge 'dzin bya'o //
T02D1647:311b-22: slob dpon gcig gis nyes pa bshags pa'i bsam gtan bya ste /
T02D1647:311b-23: shi ba'i rnam par shes pa'i sems bar do'i srid
T02D1647:311b-24: pa'i ngo bo lus ngag yid gsum gyi mtshan ma
T02D1647:311b-25: 'bru gsum kha dog so so ste /
T02D1647:311b-26: ser po gnyis kyis brten pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na gnas par bsams la /
T02D1647:311b-27: bsgrub bya'i sngar gyi lus de nyid kyis yi ge
T02D1647:311b-28: brgya ba zlos shing bshags pa byed par bsgoms te
T02D1647:311b-29: / aom badzra satva sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya /
T02D1647:311b-30: badzra satva tve no pa tishtha /
T02D1647:311b-32: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D1647:311b-33: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D1647:311b-34: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D1647:311b-36: sarba karma su tsa me tsittam shre ya:/
T02D1647:311b-41: badzra m'a me munytsa badzra'i bha ba /
T02D1647:311b-42: ma h'a sa ma ya satva a'a /
T02D1647:311b-43: zhes brjod cing bshags pa byed par bsam mo //
T02D1647:311b-45: gcig gis gsum ka'i ting nge 'dzin rim gyis bya bar yang rung ngo //
T02D1647:311b-47: thab de nyid du mar dang 'o ma dang /
T02D1647:312a-2: ts'a ru'i phung sbyin sreg tu phul la /
T02D1647:312a-4: de nas smon lam gdab ste /
T02D1647:312a-5: na mo sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi bka'i byin gyi rlabs kyi bden pa dang /
T02D1647:312a-6: rig sngags dang gsang sngags dang snying po dang phyag
T02D1647:312a-7: rgya dang ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyi rlabs dang
T02D1647:312a-8: / bdag cag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i stobs dang /
T02D1647:312a-9: chos nyid rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo
T02D1647:312a-10: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthu dang bden pa'i byin
T02D1647:312a-11: gyi rlabs kyis / deng tshe 'phos shing lus brjes
T02D1647:312a-12: pa 'di rnan par smin pa'i phung po 'di la
T02D1647:312a-13: gyi rlabs kyis / brten nas / dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhung bzhin du bskrun pa 'dis /
T02D1647:312a-14: tshe 'phos pa 'di dmyal ba'i gnas su mi skye
T02D1647:312a-15: bar gyur cig / gal te skyes par gyur na
T02D1647:312a-16: / dmyal ba tsha grang la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral nas /
T02D1647:312a-17: dmyal ba rnams la sprul pa'i sku gshin rje chos
T02D1647:312a-18: kyi rgyal po lta bus chos ston pa'i skal pa
T02D1647:312a-19: dang ldan par gyur cig / gzhan yang yi dags
T02D1647:312a-20: kyi gnas su mi skye bar gyur cig / gal
T02D1647:312a-21: te skyes par gyur ba na /
T02D1647:312a-22: yi dags kyi bkres skom gyi sdug bsngal la sogs pa dang bral nas /
T02D1647:312a-23: yi dags rnams la sprul pa'i sku kha 'bar ma
T02D1647:312a-24: lta bus chos ston pa'i skal pa dang ldan par
T02D1647:312a-25: gyur cig / gzhan yang byol song gi gnas su
T02D1647:312a-26: ma skye bar gyur cig / gal te skyes par
T02D1647:312a-27: gyur pa na / byol song gi bsha' bzhur la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral nas ;
T02D1647:312a-28: byol song rnams la sprul pa'i sku gser bzang lta
T02D1647:312a-29: bus chos ston pa'i skal pa dang ldan par gyur
T02D1647:312a-30: cig / gzhan yang mi'i 'dre mi'i sdug bsngal gsum
T02D1647:312a-31: dang brgyad la sogs pa dang bral nas /
T02D1647:312a-32: mi rnams la sprul pa'i sku sh'akya thub pa lta
T02D1647:312a-33: bus chos ston pa'i skal ba dang ldan par gyur
T02D1647:312a-34: cig / gzhan yang lha ma yin gyi 'dre /
T02D1647:312a-35: lha ma yin gyi sdug bsngal khong khro dang 'thab rtsod la sogs pa dang bral nas /
T02D1647:312a-36: lha ma yin rnams la sprul pa'i sku thags bzangs
T02D1647:312a-37: ris lta bus chos ston pa'i skal ba dang ldan
T02D1647:312b-0: par gyur cig gzhan yang lha'i @312b 'dre /
T02D1647:312b-1: lha'i sdug bsngal 'chi 'pho dang ltung ba la sogs pa dang bral nas /
T02D1647:312b-2: lha rnams la sbrul pa'i sku brgya byin lta bus
T02D1647:312b-3: chos ston pa'i skal ba dang ldan par gyur cig
T02D1647:312b-4: / de ltar khams gsum gyis sdug bsngal las grol
T02D1647:312b-5: te / khyad par gyi lam lnga la brten nas /
T02D1647:312b-8: mthar bla na med pa'i byang chub phyag rgya chen po mchog gi go 'phang lhun gyis grub ste /
T02D1647:312b-9: 'khor ba ma stong gi bar du sems can thams
T02D1647:312b-10: cad kyi don rgyun mi 'chad par spyod pa'i skal
T02D1647:312b-11: ba dang ldan par gyur cig de nas dge ba'i
T02D1647:312b-12: rtsa ba bsngo // de nas phyis sreg khang du 'o ma gtor te /
T02D1647:312b-14: rus bu btus la s'atstsha btab nas /
T02D1647:312b-16: ro sbyang ba'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga / bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag la brten nas /
